item.title: By: Taylor
item.dc:creator: Taylor
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2016/01/status/#comment-192526">Taylor</a>.
I wrote too soon. You answered all my questions in your later post. Please disregard. Happy wrenching.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Taylor.

I wrote too soon. You answered all my questions in your later post. Please disregard. Happy wrenching.

item.title: By: Taylor
item.dc:creator: Taylor
item.description:
Curious to know why you're planning on re-upholstering the seats. I could've swore you had them redone in the synthetic suede just a while back. Given that limited amount of seat time you've had in the car, has the material already worn off that bad?
Also, what's wrong with the front bumper? I think you also went through a couple iterations on that guy.
Finally, what's wrong with the current rollbar? Has it failed or something? Very curious your rationale to these items on the to-do list.
item.content:encoded:
Curious to know why you’re planning on re-upholstering the seats. I could’ve swore you had them redone in the synthetic suede just a while back. Given that limited amount of seat time you’ve had in the car, has the material already worn off that bad?

Also, what’s wrong with the front bumper? I think you also went through a couple iterations on that guy.

Finally, what’s wrong with the current rollbar? Has it failed or something? Very curious your rationale to these items on the to-do list.
